text: Vittorio Guerrieri (born December 23, 1958) is an Italian actor and voice actor. He is known for being the official dubber of Ben Stiller in various movies. He was born in Rome. Guerrieri is married to voice actress Roberta Greganti. In Guerrieri's animated roles, he voiced Squit in the Italian dub of Animaniacs as well as Freakazoid in the Italian dub of the series of the same name. == References == == Other websites == * * Category:1958 births Category:Living people Category:Actors from Rome Category:Italian voice actors Category:Italian television actors Category:Italian movie actors Category:Child actors
title: Vittorio Guerrieri
